price.name: Price
price.script:
src = { sources: { "BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt":BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt }, localTimestamp: time }

ohlc = options.useHeikinAshi ? avg_heikinashi(src) : options.useGaps ? avg_ohlc_with_gaps(src) : avg_ohlc(src)

plotcandlestick(ohlc, id=price) 

/*var ohlc = options.useHeikinAshi ? 
    avg_heikinashi(bar) : 
    options.useGaps ? 
    avg_ohlc_with_gaps(bar) : 
    avg_ohlc(bar)

plotcandlestick(ohlc, id=price)*/

large-liquidations.name: Large Liquidations

spotvsperp.script:
var binance = (BINANCE:btcusdt.high+BINANCE:btcusdt.low)/2
var bitfinex = (BITFINEX:BTCUSD.high+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.low)/2

var binancePerp = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.high+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.low)/2
var bybit = (BYBIT:BTCUSDT.high+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.low)/2


premium =  (binancePerp + bybit) / 2 - (binance+bitfinex) / 2
baseline = 0

plotcloudarea(
  premium,
  baseline, 
  positiveColor=options.topLineColor,
  negativeColor=options.bottomLineColor
)

//line(bitfinex)

_oh4jdeuqr3sfb21e.script:
close = BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.close

range = BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.high - BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.low
averageRange = sma(range, options.length)

basis = ema(close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * averageRange
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)

cvd-coinbase.name: CVD Coinbase

cvd-binance-spot.script: plotline(cum((BINANCE:btctusd.vbuy + BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy+ BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+ BINANCE:btcusdc.vbuy) - (BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell + BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell + BINANCE:btcusdc.vsell + BINANCE:btctusd.vsell)), title=B)
cvd-binance-spot.name: CVD Binance Spot

perpvscoinbase.name: perpvscoinbase

spotvsperp.script:
var binance = (BINANCE:btcusdt.high+BINANCE:btcusdt.low)/2
var bitfinex = (BITFINEX:BTCUSD.high+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.low)/2

var binancePerp = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.high+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.low)/2
var bybit = (BYBIT:BTCUSDT.high+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.low)/2
var isBybit = BYBIT:BTCUSDT.high ? 1 : 0

premium = (binancePerp + bybit) / (1+isBybit) - (binance+bitfinex) / 2
baseline = 0


plotcloudarea(premium, baseline,title="P")
//line(
//  ema(premium, 10)
//)

range = BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.high - BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.low
averageRange = sma(range, options.length)

relative-volume.script:
volume = vbuy + vsell
volumeAvg = ema(volume, options.volumeAvgPeriod)
highVolume = volume > volumeAvg*options.volumeAvgMult
notHighVolume = volume < volumeAvg*options.volumeAvgMult

plothistogram({ time: time, value: volume, color: notHighVolume? options.neutralColor : vbuy > vsell ? options.upColor : options.downColor})
relative-volume.name: Relative Volume

obv-perps.name: OBV perps

volume copy 1.name: Volume

mfi.script:
src = ($price.high + $price.low + $price.close) / 3
volume=vbuy+vsell
change=src-src[1]
upper = sum(volume * (change <= 0 ? 0 : src), 14)
lower = sum(volume * (change >= 0 ? 0 : src), 14)
mf = !lower ? null : 100 - (100 / (1 + upper / lower))
plotline(mf, color=#459915)
plotline(80, color=#c0c0c0, lineStyle=3)
plotline(20, color=#c0c0c0, lineStyle=3)
mfi.name: MFI

_6m86thjnc4nkz9c4.script:
src = ($price.high + $price.low + $price.close) / 3
volume=vbuy+vsell
change=src-src[1]
upper = sum(vbuy * (change <= 0 ? 0 : src), 14)
lower = sum(vsell * (change >= 0 ? 0 : src), 14)
mf = !lower ? null : 100 - (100 / (1 + upper / lower))
plotline(mf, color=#459915)
plotline(80, color=#c0c0c0, lineStyle=3)
plotline(20, color=#c0c0c0, lineStyle=3)
